about_the_game:
It's a hot vacation time. Surrounded by an atmosphere of freedom, away from everyday worries, spending free minutes under the starry sky on the seashore, the feelings flare up so often, starting a bright sense of falling in love, which turns into a summer love.



Summer love… Ideally, it has only three stages: ""getting to know each other,"" ""immense rapture and admiration,"" ""breaking up forever."" And the lucky ones find their one and only love just in a few weeks of vacation 😏

You Should Try It too!


Diana is a charming stranger with whom you are forced to live in the same bungalow due to the reception fault.

You are a young guy who came on vacation looking for a romantic adventure.

Sand Story is a kinetic visual novel, where you have to win the heart of a beautiful girl.

How will your relationship end? A little fling or a big disappointment?

Interact with the story's protagonists and other characters. Have fun at the beach, swim in the ocean, explore a cave, have a vacation fling, and much more.

Features:

  • HD graphics, enjoy stunning graphics in Full HD
  • Beautiful illustrations
  • Rich sound background, so you can fully immerse yourself in the game atmosphere
  • 38,000 words (30 minutes)
  • Scene gallery

This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, it is also unsuitable for playing at work :)
